name: LVI ENVIRONMENTAL SERVICES, INC. v. DELTA/B.J.D.S., INC. and Travelers Casualty and Surety Company v. Suffolk Construction Company, Inc. and National Union Fire Insurance Company of Pittsburgh, PA. Petition of: LVI Environmental Services, Inc. and National Union Fire Insurance Company of Pittsburgh
name_abbreviation: LVI Environmental Services Inc. v. Delta/B.J.D.S., Inc.

parties: LVI ENVIRONMENTAL SERVICES, INC. v. DELTA/B.J.D.S., INC. and Travelers Casualty and Surety Company v. Suffolk Construction Company, Inc. and National Union Fire Insurance Company of Pittsburgh, PA. Petition of: LVI Environmental Services, Inc. and National Union Fire Insurance Company of Pittsburgh.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 13th day of November, 2007, the Petitions for Allowance of Appeal and the Application for Post-Submission and for Summary Disposition are hereby DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
937 A.2d 384
LVI ENVIRONMENTAL SERVICES, INC. v. DELTA/B.J.D.S., INC. and Travelers Casualty and Surety Company v. Suffolk Construction Company, Inc. and National Union Fire Insurance Company of Pittsburgh, PA. Petition of: LVI Environmental Services, Inc. and National Union Fire Insurance Company of Pittsburgh.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Nov. 13, 2007.
